name: Awakening Dream
description:
Jam Theme : "İçindeki Canavar"

"Why people are bad?" said Elena to herself. "We are all same here but people are bad even in an orphanage." We will witness Elena, who is a bullied child in the orphanage. We will discover her 'monster inside' and with your help, she will break free.

Our goal was to create a complete game from beginning to end. However, time constraints limited the polishing and the creation of a good puzzle. On the other hand, we believe that our idea created a unique mechanic.

You can interact (F) with lamps, carry the boxes and climb (Space)  on them when you're Elena.

Keys: 

WASD = Movement

F = Interaction

Space = Climb (Only available in Elena)

Used Assets: Animations have been taken from Mixamo. Others made in jam by our members.

3D Artist: Emre Topcu

Game Developer: Ozan Soylu

Game Designer: Furkan Vatansever

Sound Artist: Furkan Vatansever

Thanks to my sister Zeynep Vatansever for bringing Elena's voice to life.
